hiveArticle.title: India White Washed Srilanka by 3-0
hiveArticle.body:
In the third test of three match series India has won by an innings and 171 runs and claimed 1st ever 3-0 series win overseas.

**Indian Batting 1st Innings**

S Dhawan - 119
KL Rahul - 85
CA Pujara - 8
V Kohli - 42
AM Rahane - 17
R Ashwin - 31
WP Saha - 16
HH Pandya - 108
Kuldeep Yadav - 26
Mohammed Shami - 8
UT Yadav - not out 3

**Sri Lankan Batting 1st Innings**

FDM Karunaratne - 4
WU Tharanga - 5
BKG Mendis - 18
LD Chandimal - 48
AD Mathews - 0
N Dickwella - 29
MDK Perera - 0
PM Pushpakumara - 10
PADLR Sandakan - 10
MVT Fernando - 0
CBRLS Kumara not out 0

**Sri Lankan Batting 2nd Innings**

FDM Karunaratne - 16
WU Tharanga - 7
PM Pushpakumara - 1
BKG Mendis -12
LD Chandimal - 36
AD Mathews - 35
N Dickwella - 41
MDK Perera - 8
PADLR Sandakan - 8
MVT Fernando not out 4
CBRLS Kumara - 10

**Breif Scores** : Sri Lanka 181 (Chandimal 36; Ashwin 4/68) & 135 (Chandimal 48; Kuldeep 4/40) trail India 487 (Dhawan 119, Pandya 108; Sandakan 5/132) by an innings and 171 runs
